name: Hersh Gulati

current_company.name: RPSG Capital Ventures
current_company.title: Principal at RPSG Capital Ventures ; Ex Blume ; Ex First League Ventures ; Ex EY

experience.title: Founding Partner
experience.description: First League Ventures is an independent advisory boutique, based out of NCR serving the M&A and PE fund raising advisory needs of early stage and growth companies. FLV assists clients to grow their businesses organically and inorganically. FLV assists its clients through all the decision making process - be it strategy formulation, expansion, identifying strategic alliance partners and investors, raising debt or equity or integrating an acquisition, project managing the steps, assisting in negotiations and financial models and in measuring transaction implications. Covering a wide spectrum of industries, including Media, Technology, Telecom and related Infrastructure, Healthcare, F&B, Education, IT/ITeS and E-Commerce. Our team has deep industry knowledge and provides expert perspectives to offer breakthrough business insights and customized solutions on unique industry challenges
